attributes.action: To instate a full government in Wales with our own taxes and powers to make law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long we have been the underdog in the Uk. But times are changing in North Wales our power stations produce enough power to keep Wales running indefinitely. Our water, electric and food is ransacked from Wales to England and yet we pay more than our English neighbours. We know longer need England to be independent and we should have our own laws, taxes and power.
